thread.title: Geoff Joyce
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Geoff Joyce

author: Geoff Joyce
title: Geoff Joyce
text:
Have purchased a few things from Store DJ, & every time I get looked after by Mike Blades his customer service is exemplary, his knowledge always on point, & whenever he doesn't know the answer, he says he doesn't but always gets the answer to me within 24 hrs.
Thanks Mike, thanks Store DJ.
